      zIndex: '100',

      boxShadow: "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",

sourcesContent:
import rudrawin from "assets/img/image/news/rudrawin2.webp";
import urcupdate from "assets/img/image/news/urc2020.webp";
import anet from "assets/img/image/news/anet.webp";
import sparkfun from "assets/img/image/news/sparkfun.webp";
import { isParenthesizedExpression } from "typescript";

const newsStyle = {

    video: {
        height: '100%',
        zIndex: '-1'
    },
    title: {
        fontFamily: 'cairoBlack',
        color: '#fff',
        fontSize: '200px',
        fontWeight: '400',
        textStrokeWidth: '5px',
        textStrokeColor: '#fff',
        textFillColor: 'transparent',
        zIndex: '20'
    },
    news1: {
        backgroundColor: '#000',
        zIndex: '100',
        color: 'transparent',
        borderRadius: "6px",
        boxShadow: "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
        transition: '250ms ease-in-out',
        transformOrigin: 'top',
        '&:hover': {
            transform: 'scale(1.2)',
            backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72))',
            zIndex: '200',
            color: 'white',
        },
    },
    news2: {
        backgroundColor: '#000',
        zIndex: '100',
        color: 'transparent',
        borderRadius: "6px",
        boxShadow: "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
        transition: '250ms ease-in-out',
        transformOrigin: 'top',
        '&:hover': {
            transform: 'scale(1.2)',
            backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72))',
            zIndex: '200',
            color: 'white',
        },
    },
    news3: {
        backgroundColor: '#000',
        zIndex: '100',
        color: 'transparent',
        borderRadius: "6px",
        boxShadow: "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
        transition: '250ms ease-in-out',
        transformOrigin: 'top',
        '&:hover': {
            transform: 'scale(1.2)',
            backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72))',
            zIndex: '200',
            color: 'white',
        },
    },
    news4: {
        backgroundColor: '#000',
        zIndex: '100',
        color: 'transparent',
        borderRadius: "6px",
        boxShadow: "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
        transition: '250ms ease-in-out',
        transformOrigin: 'top',
        '&:hover': {
            transform: 'scale(1.2)',
            backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72))',
            zIndex: '200',
            color: 'white',
        },
    },
    news5: {
        backgroundColor: '#000',
        zIndex: '100',
        color: 'transparent',
        borderRadius: "6px",
        boxShadow: "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
        transition: '250ms ease-in-out',
        transformOrigin: 'top',
        '&:hover': {
            transform: 'scale(1.2)',
            backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72))',
            zIndex: '200',
            color: 'white',
        },
    },
    '@media (max-width: 800px)': {
        container: {
            height: '90vh',
            width: '91vw',
            overflow: 'hidden',
        },
        title: {
            fontFamily: 'cairoBlack',
            position: 'absolute',
            color: '#fff',
            marginTop: '-85vh',
            marginLeft: '30vw',
            fontSize: '50px',
            fontWeight: '400',
            textStrokeWidth: '3px',
            textStrokeColor: '#fff',
            textFillColor: 'transparent',
            zIndex: '20',
        },
        wrapper: {
            fontFamily: 'cairoLight',
            color: 'white',
            fontSize: '12px',
            marginLeft: '15px',
            marginTop: '60px',
        },
        wrapper2: {
            fontSize: '20px',
            marginLeft: '25px',
            marginTop: '210px',
        },
        section1: {
            position: 'absolute',
            marginLeft: '4vw',
            marginTop: '-75vh',
            height: '30vh',
            width: '82vw',
            zIndex: '100',
            borderRadius: "6px",
            boxShadow: "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
            backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72)), url(' + rudrawin + ')',
            backgroundSize: 'cover',
        },
        section2: {
            position: 'absolute',
            marginLeft: '4vw',
            marginTop: '-38vh',
            height: '13vh',
            width: '40vw',
            zIndex: '100',
            borderRadius: "6px",
            boxShadow: "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
            backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72)), url(' + urcupdate + ')',
            backgroundSize: 'cover',
        },
        section3: {
            position: 'absolute',
            marginLeft: '48vw',
            marginTop: '-38vh',
            height: '13vh',
            width: '38vw',
            zIndex: '100',
            borderRadius: "6px",
            boxShadow: "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
            backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72)), url(' + anet + ')',
            backgroundSize: 'cover',
        },
        section4: {
            position: 'absolute',
            marginLeft: '4vw',
            marginTop: '-22vh',
            height: '13vh',
            width: '38vw',
            zIndex: '100',
            borderRadius: "6px",
            boxShadow: "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
            backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72)), url(' + sparkfun + ')',
            backgroundSize: 'cover',
        },
        section5: {
            position: 'absolute',
            marginLeft: '48vw',
            marginTop: '-22vh',
            height: '13vh',
            width: '38vw',
            zIndex: '100',
            borderRadius: "6px",
            boxShadow: "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
            backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72)), url(' + sparkfun + ')',
            backgroundSize: 'cover',
        },
        downvote: {
            position: 'absolute',
            marginLeft: '37vw',
            marginTop: '-7vh',
            height: '50px',
            width: '50px',
            zIndex: '10000',
        },
        arrow: {
            width: "50px",
            height: "50px",
            marginLeft: "8px",
            transition: '1s',
            color: '#ffffdd',
        },
    },

    '@media (min-width: 800px)': {
        container: {
            display: "flex",
            alignItems: "center",
            justifyContent: "space-around",
            flexWrap: 'wrap',
            height: '115vh',
            width: '96vw'
        },

        
        wrapper: {
            fontFamily: 'cairoLight',
            fontSize: '30px',
            marginLeft: '10px',
            marginTop: '250px',
        },
        section1: {
            backgroundColor: '#000',
            zIndex: '100',
            color: 'transparent',
            borderRadius: "6px",
            boxShadow: "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
            transition: '250ms ease-in-out',
            transformOrigin: 'top',
            '&:hover': {
                transform: 'scale(1.2)',
                backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72))',
                zIndex: '200',
                color: 'white',
            },
        },
        section2: {
            // maxHeight: '16vw',
            // width: '25vw',
            backgroundColor: '#000',
            zIndex: '100',
            color: 'transparent',
            borderRadius: "6px",
            boxShadow:
                "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
            transition: '250ms ease-in-out',
            transformOrigin: 'top',
            // backgroundImage:'url('+ urcupdate +')',
            backgroundSize: '100%',
            '&:hover': {
                transform: 'scale(1.2)',
                backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72)), url(' + urcupdate + ')',
                zIndex: '200',
                color: 'white'
            },
        },
        section3: {
            // width: '22vw',
            backgroundColor: '#000',
            zIndex: '100',
            color: 'transparent',
            borderRadius: "6px",
            boxShadow:
                "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
            transition: '250ms ease-in-out',
            transformOrigin: 'bottom left',
            // backgroundImage:'url('+ anet +')',
            backgroundSize: 'cover',
            '&:hover': {
                transform: 'scale(1.2)',
                backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72)), url(' + anet + ')',
                zIndex: '200',
                color: 'white'
            },
        },
        section4: {
            // width: '22vw',
            backgroundColor: '#000',
            zIndex: '100',
            color: 'transparent',
            borderRadius: "6px",
            boxShadow:
                "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
            transition: '250ms ease-in-out',
            transformOrigin: 'bottom',
            backgroundImage: 'url(' + sparkfun + ')',
            backgroundSize: 'cover',
            '&:hover': {
                transform: 'scale(1.2)',
                backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72)), url(' + sparkfun + ')',
                zIndex: '200',
                color: 'white'
            },
        },
        section5: {
            // width: '22vw',
            backgroundColor: '#000',
            zIndex: '100',
            color: 'transparent',
            borderRadius: "6px",
            boxShadow:
                "0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
            transition: '250ms ease-in-out',
            transformOrigin: 'bottom right',
            backgroundImage: 'url(' + sparkfun + ')',
            backgroundSize: 'cover',
            '&:hover': {
                transform: 'scale(1.2)',
                backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.72)), url(' + sparkfun + ')',
                zIndex: '200',
                color: 'white'
            },
        },
        downvote: {
            height: '50px',
            width: '50px',
            zIndex: '10000',
        },
        arrow: {
            width: "100px",
            height: "100px",
            transition: '1s',
            color: '#fff',
        },
    }
}

export default newsStyle;
